CustomField.formula: CASE(MOD( RTL_Register_Date__c - DATE(1985,6,24),7), 1 , CASE( MOD( TODAY()-RTL_Register_Date__c ,7),1,1,2,2,3,3,4,3,5,3,6,4,0), 2 , CASE( MOD( TODAY()-RTL_Register_Date__c ,7),1,1,2,2,3,2,4,2,5,3,6,4,0), 3 , CASE( MOD( TODAY()-RTL_Register_Date__c ,7),1,1,2,1,3,1,4,2,5,3,6,4,0), 4 , CASE( MOD( TODAY()-RTL_Register_Date__c ,7),1,0,2,0,3,1,4,2,5,3,6,4,0), 5 , CASE( MOD( TODAY()-RTL_Register_Date__c ,7),1,0,2,0,3,1,4,2,5,3,6,4,0), 6 , CASE( MOD( TODAY()-RTL_Register_Date__c ,7),1,0,2,1,3,2,4,3,5,4,6,4,0), CASE( MOD( TODAY()-RTL_Register_Date__c ,7),1,1,2,2,3,3,4,4,5,4,6,4,0)) + (FLOOR(( TODAY()-RTL_Register_Date__c )/7)*5)
CustomField.label: No Contact Aging
